small.description: Whether to use a small pagination style
small.description_zh: 是否使用小型分页样式

background.description: Whether to add a background color to the pagination button
background.description_zh: 是否为分页按钮添加背景色

:page-size.description: Displays the number of entries per page and supports the .sync modifier
:page-size.description_zh: 每页显示条目个数，支持 .sync 修饰符

:page-count.description: Total number of pages, total and page-count can be set to achieve the function of displaying page numbers; If you want to support changes to page-sizes, you'll need to use the total attribute
:page-count.description_zh: 总页数，total 和 page-count 设置任意一个就可以达到显示页码的功能；如果要支持 page-sizes 的更改，则需要使用 total 属性

:pager-count.description: The number of page number buttons, which collapses when the total number of pages exceeds this value
:pager-count.default: 大于等于 5 且小于等于 21 的奇数
:pager-count.description_zh: 页码按钮的数量，当总页数超过该值时会折叠

:current-page.description: The current number of pages, with support for the .sync modifier
:current-page.description_zh: 当前页数，支持 .sync 修饰符

layout.description: Component layout, with child component names separated by commas
layout.default: sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper, `->`, total, slot
layout.description_zh: 组件布局，子组件名用逗号分隔

:page-sizes.description: Option settings for the number of display selectors per page
:page-sizes.description_zh: 每页显示个数选择器的选项设置

popper-class.description: The drop-down box class name of the number selector is displayed on each page
popper-class.description_zh: 每页显示个数选择器的下拉框类名

prev-text.description: Override icon to display the previous page text
prev-text.description_zh: 替代图标显示的上一页文字

next-text.description: The text on the next page displayed by the alternate icon
next-text.description_zh: 替代图标显示的下一页文字

hide-on-single-page.description: Whether it is hidden when there is only one page

events.name: current-change
events.description: currentPage is triggered when it changes

events.name: prev-click
events.description: It is triggered when the user clicks the Previous button to change the current page
events.description_zh: 用户点击上一页按钮改变当前页后触发

events.name: next-click
events.description: It is triggered when the user clicks the next page button to change the current page
events.description_zh: 用户点击下一页按钮改变当前页后触发
